name: Unite UX
description:
Unite UX plugin allows you to export your UI kits from Figma to Unite UX application. You can create your own kit or use our Kendo UI kits based on Bootstrap and Material Design to kickstart your component library.

 

When youâ€™re ready to handoff the designs to the developers, export to the Unite UX app and share with the team of developers. Hassle-free!


Now your development team is ready to implement the design requirements on top of the Kendo UI components.


Unite UX plugin supports the transfer of metrics, layers, components, variants and design tokens.


Join the Insiders Community. Be the first to try out Unite UX
